metadata.Title: CVE-2023-3397 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: A race condition occurred between the functions lmLogClose and txEnd inJFS, in the Linux Kernel, executed in different threads. This flaw allows alocal attacker with normal user privileges to crash the system or leakinternal kernel information.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
linux-lts-xenial: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
